responses: Hi there, what can I do for you?
Hi there, how can I help?
No worries! I'm happy to help.
I can help you book train tickets, predict train delays, or help you with any contingencies.

patterns: I want to find out how much my train is delayed
Can you tell me what the delay is?
responses: Sure! Tell me some more information, and I will predict how much you have been delayed.
Can you give me more information?

patterns: I need to book a ticket
Can you help me with booking?
How do I book a ticket?
What information do you need to book a ticket?
responses: Sure, I can help you with that. To book a ticket, I need to know the following information: departure station, destination station, travel date, return date (if applicable), and any specific preferences you have.

patterns: Do you have any accessibility information?
Can I travel on a wheelchair?
Do I need to reserve a wheelchair space?
responses:
Most trains will be able to accommodate wheelchairs and mobility scooters. There are a limited number of spaces available to wheelchair users on each train, so we recommend making a reservation if one is available. If a space is not available onboard because they are reserved by other customers, the Passenger Assist team will help you find the right options for your journey.

For further information on accessibility, please visit the National Rail website.

patterns: Can I see the train's timetable?
I want to know the timetable for my train.
responses:
I'm sorry, I don't have the timetable function yet.

However, you can view the timetables on the National Rail website. You can also view live departures and plan your journey. Please click here to view the most up-to-date timetables.

patterns: Can you tell me information about service disruptions?
Can you give me an update on service disruptions?
Are there any service disruptions affecting my journey?
responses:
Sorry, I don't have a function for service disruption yet.

However, you can see live updates of all train status and service disruption information on the National Rail Website. Please click here to view any service disruption information.
